    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(IUploader uploader,
              IConfig schedulerConfig,
              TopologyAPI.Topology topology)
        Description copied from interface: ILauncher
        Initialize Launcher with Config, Uploader and topology. These object will be passed from submitter main. Config will contain information that launcher may use to setup scheduler and other parameters required by launcher to contact services which will launch scheduler.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface ILauncher
        Parameters:
        uploader - Uploader object used to upload jar.
        schedulerConfig - yaml config file containing scheduler config.
        topology - Topology proto from topology definition.

      • prepareLaunch

        public boolean prepareLaunch(PackingPlan packing)
        Description copied from interface: ILauncher
        Will be called locally before trying to launch topology remotely
        Specified by:
        prepareLaunch in interface ILauncher
        Returns:
        true if successful

      • launchTopology

        public boolean launchTopology(PackingPlan packing)
        Description copied from interface: ILauncher
        Starts scheduler. Once this function returns successfully, heron-cli will terminate and launch process succeed.
        Specified by:
        launchTopology in interface ILauncher
        Parameters:
        packing - Initial mapping suggested by running packing algorithm. container_id->List of instance_id to be launched on this container.
        Returns:
        true if topology launched successfully, false otherwise.

        Specified by:
        postLaunch in interface ILauncher
        Returns:

        public SchedulerStateManagerAdaptor getStateManager()
        Description copied from interface: ILauncher
        Returns StateManager to be used for uploading ExecutionState and Topology proto. TODO(nbhagat): (StateManager should be created by Submitter and information to create should be present in config).
        Specified by:
        getStateManager in interface ILauncher
        Returns:
        StateManager object which implements setExecutionState and setTopology methods.

      • updateExecutionState

        public ExecutionEnvironment.ExecutionState updateExecutionState(ExecutionEnvironment.ExecutionState executionState)
        Description copied from interface: ILauncher
        Add/Modify additional information in execution state. Returns new ExecutionState created using current execution state and adding additional Launch specific information TODO(nbhagat): Don't overload heron's ExecutionState with scheduler specific data.
        Specified by:
        updateExecutionState in interface ILauncher
        Parameters:

        Returns:
